values.description: The Iron Condor is an Option strategy that consists of four contracts where the order of strike prices is A>B>C>D.
values.keywords: iron condor option strategy, manually place multi-leg orders, profits from a decrease in price movement, profits from an increase in price movement, limited-reward-limited-risk strategy, risk of early assignment
